Subject: Christofle Product Insurance 
--------------------------------------------------
Hello Hagop. 

Hope all is well. 

I need your assistance in creating insurance for the items in the attached list for the Christofle Artisan Dinner happening tomorrow. We will need to insure the items from today to the 12th of December. The event will take place in Dubai. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Best,
Nesma Shahin.
